Storage.StorageGetIndexId (METH)
Storage.StorageGetIndexId (METH)
Â¶
METHOD StorageGetIndexId : STO.ERROR
Determines the id of an index of a table.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
StorageGetIndexId
STO.ERROR
The error code. Can return ERROR.NOT_IMPLEMENTED for non-
sqlite implementations
Inout
sIndex
STRING
The name of the index
sTable
STRING
The name of the table the index belongs to
Output
idIndex
CAA.IDENT
Returns id of the index.
